title: Fonts to befriend HFJ Didot
content:
I am busy designing a new template for a magazine and was wondering if ayone has a great text font to combine with this beautiful Didot.HAve looked at Mercury text, Chronicle Text and Farnham...any groundbreaking ideas please?

Mikey :-)

The only problem for mating with Gotham is that--fantastic as Gotham really is--it's getting overexposed. The thing is EVERYWHERE. When Yahoo! licenses your font and splashes it on their main page, have you jumped the shark in terms of cutting edge?

HF Didot looks great on its own merits, how about a retro suggestion? Univers.

Thanks
